page.title: 08HOME LIFE._PETS_
page.content: My pet is a hamster,his name is Jim. Jim is white with red eyes and a pink nose,feet and tail.Jim lives in a cage with metal bars and a wheel to exercise in.Jim has special hamster bedding similar to polyester.We put sawdust on the floor of Jim's cage,we do this so when we clean out his cage we just empty the sawdust out of the cage,instead of washing the cage floor.When we change the bedding in the cage,we only change half of the bedding so there is still some of Jim's scent in his bedding.We feed Jim nuts,fruit,vegetables and cake. At about 16.00 we put Jim in a hollow, clear,plastic ball for exercise. When Jim is in his ball we can see where he is and what he is doing.Jim sharpens his teeth by nibbling on the bars of his cage.In the daytime Jim is usually in bed but at night he is awake.
